input_type.script:
#!/bin/bash
function makeIntVer() { ver="$1" ver=$(awk -F. ' { if ( NF == 1 ) print $0 ".0.0"; if ( NF == 2 ) print $0 ".0"; if ( NF >= 3 ) print $0;} ' <<< $ver) [[ -n "$2" ]] && ver="$ver.$2" letters=( {a..z} ) ver=$(tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' <<< $ver) ver=$(sed 's/[-(]/./g' <<< $ver) ver=$(sed 's/[ )]//g' <<< $ver) for (( i=0; i<=${#letters[@]}-1; i++ )) do if [ $i -le 9 ]; then ver=$(sed "s/${letters[$i]}/0$i/g" <<< $ver) else ver=$(sed "s/${letters[$i]}/$i/g" <<< $ver) fi done ver=$(awk -v minlen="$3" -F. ' BEGIN { len = 0 } { for ( i = 1; i <= NF; i++ ) { if ( length ( $i ) > len ) len = length( $i ) } } END { if ( len < minlen ) len = minlen; cmd = "%0" len "d"; printf($1); for ( i = 2; i <= NF; i++ ) printf( cmd, $i ) } ' <<< $ver) echo $ver }
TARGET="%PATH%" VERKEY1="CFBundleShortVersionString" VERKEY2="CFBundleVersion" BUILDKEY="" MINPLACE=3
version=$(defaults read "$TARGET/Contents/Info.plist" $VERKEY1) [[ -z "$version" ]] && version=$(defaults read "$TARGET/Contents/Info.plist" $VERKEY2)
if [ -n "$BUILDKEY" ]; then build=$(defaults read "$TARGET/Contents/Info.plist" $BUILDKEY) else build="" fi
if [ -z "$version" ]; then echo "<result>0</result>" else intver=$(makeIntVer "$version" "$build" "$MINPLACE") echo "<result>$intver</result>" fi
exit 0
